name: LOOLY'S PBC
description: Producer of plant-based food products intended to re-engineer preventative healthcare facilities. The company's products are prepared through peer-reviewed research to determine the nutrition goals of each menu that are available in software-enabled mobile cupboards placed at company lobbies, hospitals, bus stations, and universities, enabling consumers to get their nutritional needs fulfilled through fresh, nutritional, and affordable meals.
one_liner: Producer of plant-based food products intended to re-engineer preventative healthcare facilities. The company's products are prepared through peer-reviewed research to determine the nutrition goals of each menu that are available in software-enabled mobile cupboards placed at company lobbies, hospitals, bus stations, and universities, enabling consumers to get their nutritional needs fulfilled through fresh, nutritional, and affordable meals.
